configuration.name: abstraction.conf
configuration.apis: <api name="user_name" description="Return Name for extension" syntax="" parse="(.*)" destination="user_data" argument="$1@default var effective_caller_id_name"/>
configuration.apps: <app name="bridge_tdm" description="Bridge TDM" syntax="" parse="(.*)" destination="bridge" argument="freetdm/1/a/$1"/>
